content: sweetheart cabled cup cozy yarn small amount of any worsted weight yarn of your choice the pink cozy was knit with berroco comfort needles two size 5 circular needles of any length or one long circular using the magic loop method notes this piece is worked in the round on 2 circular needles from the bottom to the top cables 2/2r - slip 2 stitches to cable needle and hold in back knit 2 from left needle knit 2 from cable needle 2/2l - slip 2 stitches to cable needle and hold in front knit 2 from left needle knit 2 from cable needle 2/2r-k2p2 - slip 2 stitches to cable needle and hold in back knit 2 from left needle purl 2 from cable needle 2/2l-p2k2 - slip 2 stitches to cable needle and hold in front purl 2 from left needle knit 2 from cable needle 2/1r-k2p1 - slip 1 stitch to cable needle and hold in back knit 2 from left needle purl 1 from cable needle 2/1l-p1k2 - slip 2 stitches to cable needle and hold in front purl 1 from left needle knit 2 from cable needle pattern cast-on 48 stitches using a long tail cast-on arrange the stitches so that there are 24 on each needle joining to work in the round round 1 k2 p2 repeat around round 2 k2 p2 repeat around round 3 k2 p4 k2 2/2r 2/2l k2 p4 k2 two times round 4 k2 p4 k12 p4 k2 two times round 5 k2 p4 2/2r-k2p2 k4 2/2l-p2k2 p4 k2 two times round 6 k2 p4 k2 p2 k4 p2 k2 p4 k2 two times round 7 k2 p3 2/1r-k2p1 p2 2/2r p2 2/1l-p1k2 p3 k2 two times round 8 k2 p3 k2 p3 k4 p3 k2 p3 k2 two times round 9 k2 p2 2/1r-k2p1 p3 k4 p3 2/1l-p1k2 p2 k2 two times round 10 k2 p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 k2 two times round 11 k2 p2 k2 p4 2/2r p4 k2 p2 k2 two times round 12 k2 p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 k2 two times round 13 k2 p2 2/2l-p2k2 2/2r 2/2l 2/2r-k2p2 p2 k2 two times round 14 k2 p4 k12 p4 k2 two times repeat rounds 5 14 one more time round 25 k2 p4 2/2r-k2p2 k4 2/2l-p2k2 p4 k2 two times round 26 k2 p2 repeat around bind off in pattern © 2025 heather long all rights reserved
